text:
:wave: Hello all,

_Apologies in advance if this is addressed within the HubSpot documentation._

I have a theme template `blog-index.html` listing the latest published posts.

As I loop over the fetched posts, I am looking for an alternative to `{{content.absolute_url}}` which would allow me to preview the linked post on another new theme template `blog-post.html`- rather than clicking through to the actual live site which is still using the old theme instead the new theme being developed.

Any advice on how to achieve this would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
